name: Yanru Qu

education.university: Beijing University of Chemical Technology, College of Material Science and Engineering

research.title: Construction of NIR II-responsive antibacterial/antifouling switchable surface
info: Researched the background and progress of stimuli-responsive switchable antibacterial.
Designed experiment plan and synthesis route. (link)
Synthesized antibacterial surface on Ti and tested the inhibition rate of bacteria growth.
Writing a review, “The progress on smart stimuli-responsive antibacterial material for wound healing”.

research.title: Preparation and application of supercapacitor by bi-metal activation method
research.organization: State Key Laboratory of Chemical Resource Engineering
info: Synthesized hierarchical porous carbon by hydrothermal of wasted rubber.
Characterized material and tested the electrochemical capacity performance of the supercapacitor.
Completed the thesis of stage achievement.
Finished a review, “The preparation and application in supercapacitor of porous carbon based on waste material ”.

research.title: Integrated Electrodes for Rechargeable Batteries
research.organization: State Key Laboratory of Chemical Resource Engineering
info: Researched progress of main batteries and analyzed the application of integrated electrode.
Writing a review, “Design and Construction of Carbon-based Integrated Electrodes for Rechargeable Batteries: Status and Prospects”.

research.title: The application of density function theory in Li–S battery
research.organization: State Key Laboratory of Chemical Resource Engineering
info: Researched the recent progress of Li-S battery and the application of DFT.
Cooperated with students in computational chemistry field.
Finished a review, “Theoretical calculation application in Li−S batteries: recent progress and perspectives” (manuscript in preparation).

research.title: Construction of novel antibacterial and anti-biofilm polymer based on polymyxin B and D-amino acid
info: Synthesized antibacterial micelle with polymer as backbone packing D-Tyr.
Characterize materials and tested ability of killing bacterial and dispersing biofilm.
Led team to enter the Creativity Competition Experimental Project and selected as a key project in college.
Won outstanding prize in the first national polymer material innovation& entrepreneurship competition.

research.title: The surface functional modification of antibacterial polymer
info: Researched recent progress on antibacterial materials and focused on polymer.
Led team to enter a scientific research competition in university with a review completed, “The surface functional modification of antibacterial polymer and the application in biomedical material”.
Published paper on Surface Technology (EI compendex& Chinese core journal).
(Qu et al. Preparation and Application of Multifunctional Quaternary Ammonium Polymers for The Engineering of Novel Antibacterial Materials[J]. Surface Technology, 2019, 220-228. (First author))
(Supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (51573014, 21504006))

publication.title: Construction of NIR II-responsive antibacterial/antifouling switchable surface
info: Researched the background and progress of stimuli-responsive switchable antibacterial.
Designed experiment plan and synthesis route. (link)
Synthesized antibacterial surface on Ti and tested the inhibition rate of bacteria growth.
Writing a review, “The progress on smart stimuli-responsive antibacterial material for wound healing”.

info: Designed chemistry workshop individually.
Led group members finish the lessons and activity in camp with foreign coworkers.

info: Translated the content in meeting for foreign merchant

organization: (Social Service Organization Registration in The Ministry of Civil Affairs of China)
info: Managing human resources, including interviewing and working arrangement for volunteers
In charge of new media part, writing articles, publishing and maintaining
The main lecturer in seminar of Learning through traveling in rural area.
Designed international volunteer activity in rural area, leading five foreigners finish village construction in Dongmenying Village, Yanqing, Beijing.
Assist the normal work for company.
Design “K12 study through rural area” project individually.

Translated for foreigners and taught them about Chinese culture
